name: I AM
description: This devotional set, entitled “I AM,” is the first of several projects that will include the reading of scripture, written devotionals, and solid biblical teaching that will act as a tool used to encourage, edify, and empower the life of a believer.  It is our prayer that this seed will be sown into your life and that as you begin to study & listen to this powerful project, the Holy Spirit would begin to reveal to you the Truth of God’s Word concerning your identity in Christ Jesus.

name: Live & Authentic
description: The vision behind this project was to provide a raw and "authentically live" worship album that somehow captures a glimpse of the energy and power of the Holy Spirit during a worship service, rather than the sound of the crowd as they sing the songs we play.  Not overly concerned about the perfection side of production, we simply pressed "record" and worshiped the Father. This project was recorded over a period of four worship services; though seven of the songs were taken from one night.  The adjustments that were made on this album in the studios were kept at a minimum and have merely been placed to lessen distraction for you, the worshiper/listener.
